com.mopon.component

类 Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mopon.component.Component
  • 直接已知子类:
    BaseServiceImpl, ConfigController, FileController, FtpController, GroupController, MemberController, MenuItemController, OperateController, RoleController, SystemController, TestController, VCodeController

    public class Component
extends java.lang.Object

    Description:统一组件类，将各个需要的组件加入到该类中统一使用

    版本:
    1.0

    Company:Mopon

    Copyright:Copyright(c)2013

    作者:
    reagan
